Uses of Class
com.squareup.picasso.Request.Builder

    • Uses of Request.Builder in com.squareup.picasso

      Methods in com.squareup.picasso that return Request.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request.Builder Request.buildUpon() 
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.centerCrop()
      Crops an image inside of the bounds specified by resize(int, int) rather than distorting the aspect ratio.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.centerInside()
      Centers an image inside of the bounds specified by resize(int, int).
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.clearCenterCrop()
      Clear the center crop transformation flag, if set.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.clearCenterInside()
      Clear the center inside transformation flag, if set.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.clearResize()
      Clear the resize transformation, if any.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.clearRotation()
      Clear the rotation transformation, if any.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.resize(int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      Resize the image to the specified size in pixels.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.rotate(float degrees)
      Rotate the image by the specified degrees.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.rotate(float degrees, float pivotX, float pivotY)
      Rotate the image by the specified degrees around a pivot point.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.setResourceId(int resourceId)
      Set the target image resource ID.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.setUri(android.net.Uri uri)
      Set the target image Uri.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.transform(Transformation transformation)
      Add a custom transformation to be applied to the image.
